title: Species Recovery | Mabuwaya Foundation
bannerText: Together, we protect the critically endangered Philippine crocodile and preserve biodiversity for future generations.
intro: Mabuwaya Foundation leads programs that combine research, conservation, and community participation to recover endangered species. Through collective action, we restore balance to our ecosystems.

cards.title: Habitat Protection
cards.text: Safeguarding wetlands, rivers, and forests to provide safe havens for crocodiles and other species.

cards.title: Community Involvement
cards.text: Working hand-in-hand with local communities to promote sustainable practices and conservation values.

cards.title: Research & Monitoring
cards.text: Conducting studies on population trends, nesting success, and ecological roles to guide effective conservation strategies.
